short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows someone's profile picture if his/her name is tagged on a post/comment. You'll also get Audition AyoDance emoticons displayed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows facebook chat emoticons on wallposts, comments, timeline, ticker, etc. Shows someone's profile picture if his/her name is tagged on a post/comment.

This extension is now merged with 'Facebook AyoDance Emoticon', so you'll also get all the Audition AyoDance emoticons displayed on your Facebook.
